snippet: Going 2-1 and stunning then-undefeated Green Bay as Kansas City’s interim coach meant a lot more than gratification for Romeo Crennel.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Kansas City Chiefs announce that interim coach Romeo Crennel will permanently replace fired coach Todd Haley; other NFL developments noted.
lead_paragraph: Going 2-1 and stunning then-undefeated Green Bay as Kansas City’s interim coach meant a lot more than gratification for Romeo Crennel.

headline.seo: Chiefs Name Romeo Crennel as Coach
headline.main: Chiefs Stay With Crennel as Coach
headline.print_headline: Chiefs Stay With Crennel as Coach
